title: Top 10 Real Estate Investment Tips for 2025
excerpt: Discover the latest strategies for maximizing your returns in real estate investment this year.
content: Australia boasts high spending and savvy consumers, setting a high bar for homegrown beauty brands and new entrants alike. A wave of brands from the region have spread their wings beyond home shores to achieve international success, such as giants Aēsop and Bondi Sands, with more now following in their footsteps, like MCoBeauty.Meanwhile, a number of UK and US names are heading down under to try their luck with discerning health and beauty buffs, known for their outdoor lifestyles.The Australian beauty and personal care market is worth an estimated €5.9bn, according to analysis by L.E.K Consulting of Euromonitor data. --ABSTRACTEND-While it is modest in size compared to global leaders, Australia represents a high-value market on a per capita basis, says Philippe Gorge, Partner and Head of European Health and Beauty Practice at L.E.K. Consulting.

excerpt: Explore the most popular modern home designs and architectural trends shaping the housing market.
